title: virus total scanner
description:
VirusTotalScanner Portable is a useful and easy to use desktop tool designed to analyze your files and display the VirusTotal results.

VirusTotalScanner Portable only works for files that have already been analyzed. It uses a hash check algorithm to detect if files have been scanned and shows the results instantly.

Here are some key features of "VirusTotalScanner Portable":

Ã‚Â· Easily & Quickly perform VirusTotal scan of your file.
Ã‚Â· Performs Hash based scan without uploading the file.
Ã‚Â· Right click context menu to launch it directly by simply right clicking on the file.
Ã‚Â· 'Drag & Drop' feature to quickly choose the file
Ã‚Â· Displays detailed VirusTotal Scan report
Ã‚Â· Very easy to use with attractive interface
Ã‚Â· Completely Portable Tool and can be run directly
